mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TIMETABLE T JOIN CLASS C ON T.CLASS_SEQ = C.SEQ LEFT JOIN ADMIN D ON C.ADMIN_SEQ = D.SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADMIN WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND DIVISION = 'system') OR (D.SEQ = #{seq} AND DIVISION = 'admin') )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TIMETABLE USING DUAL ON (DAILY = #{daily} AND CLASS_SEQ = #{class_seq}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATUS = #{status} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CLASS_SEQ, DAILY, STATUS) VALUES (#{class_seq}, #{daily}, #{status})
